body.text: Maybe if the McAllisters didn't abandon their child all the time, he wouldn't need a penthouse suite to fill with his solitude.
Penthouse=$10k/night. No problem. A $1k room service bill? KEEEEVVVVIIIINNNN?!?!?!?!?
How was he able to sneak out and see her in the first place? His family sucks.
If I remember correctly, it’s kind of suggested that her living situation was kind of self-imposed. She just “preferred” being alone.
Wasn't she just done with people after her husband died and was financially stable
If Rishi Sunak can wonder if homeless people work in business, then another stinking rich kid won’t understand what they need either
